    • Method Detail

      • getJson

        public java.lang.String getJson​(net.kyori.text.TextComponent component)
        Translates the provided TextComponent into a String containing the usable JSON for Spigot.
        You can use Spigot's ComponentSerializer to turn this into a BaseComponent array which in return can be used in Player.spigot().sendMessage(BaseComponent...) or any other suitable method.
        Parameters:
        component - The TextComponent to translate into JSON.
        Returns:
        String containing the usable JSON for Spigot, BungeeCord, etc.

      • getBaseComponents

        public net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[] getBaseComponents​(net.kyori.text.TextComponent component)
        Transforms the provided TextComponent into a BaseComponent array, which is usable in methods like Player.spigot().sendMessage(BaseComponent...)
        Parameters:
        component - The TextComponent to translate into a BaseComponent array.
        Returns:
        BaseComponent array containing the translated TextComponent.

      • arrayToString

        public java.lang.String arrayToString​(java.lang.String... strings)
        Converts an array of Strings to a single one, where each entry is a new line.
        Parameters:
        strings - The array of Strings to convert.
        Returns:
        A String containing each entry of the array as a new line.

      • listToString

        public java.lang.String listToString​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
        Converts the provided ArrayList (Type String) to a single String, where each entry in the list is a new line.
        This is just running a String.join("\n", List<String>) operation.
        Parameters:
        list - The List to convert. Has to be of type String.
        Returns:
        A String containing each entry of the List as a new line.

      • parseTextPattern

        public java.lang.String parseTextPattern​(java.lang.String item)
        Converts any appearance of text:["item","item"] to a String, where each entry is a new line.

        This will return the provided, unformatted String in the following cases:

        • The String doesn't contain text:["string","string",...]
        • The part after the text: is not valid JSON (JSON Array)
        Parameters:
        item - The String to convert.
        Returns:
        The converted String, or the provided String itself if invalid.
